locations.title: Oak Mountain State Park
locations.content: Oak Mountain State Park may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: … I was really impressed with the campground: I had a site that had electric, water and sewer. They have very good washers and dryers. Very good  shower and toilet facilities, and very friendly staff. …

… and each has a fire ring, picnic table and a trash bag hang.  We were in A near the bath house which was nice and modern - individual rooms with toilet/shower and sink.  Laundry room on end and I think it was $1.50 for wash and dry. …

… bundle) and ice ($4.00? ) to purchase. Bathroom/ shower facilities are in need of serious updating but doable. ( this is the only reason I didn't give this campground 5 stars ). Tons of walking and biking trails right from the campground, …

… park! We hammock camped and had two picnic tables, a grill and a fire pit at our site. There was a nice shower room/bathroom close to us. The workers here are friendly and helpful and the lakes and waterfall are beautiful.  When I …

Stayed in section B with our camper. The restrooms are new in super clean you get a private toilet and shower room and there's three washers and three dryers and a air conditioned room very clean beautiful Park.

… Wasn't expecting much as we were just passing thru on the way to the beach. Was extremely surprised with the campground and the bathrooms. Very clean restrooms and showers. Shower and toilet in the same room, but individual from the others.
A great State Park with lots of amenities: camping, archery, horseback riding, hiking, and more. Good clean bathrooms with hot water, and every one of them has a shower!
Beautiful Park. We only had time to drive around but we were about to check out the camp ground. It was nice with climate controlled individual (Family) bathrooms with a shower and changing table.
Ok place. Nice wooded area. Very small playground for kids. We'll enough to use bathrooms and shower, outdated. Cool trails. Full hookups. Dogs are allowed. Fire pits are at each site.
Wonderful early spring camping!  All new camping facilities including a new dog park. Fantastic playground for the kids.  Level sites. Private restroom/shower rooms. Well done!

locations.title: Cherokee Campground & RV Park
locations.content: Cherokee Campground & RV Park may offer shower facilities. Contact directly to confirm availability and pricing.

showerReviews.reviewText: Not too bad … It seems to be an older Campground . But, It’s very quiet. Roadways are somewhat rough in spots. Shower house and laundry is a little dated also. But very reasonably priced.

I thoroughly enjoy staying at this campground. Has full hook ups, laundry and shower area, and very peaceful.  Bill is so very nice and told me if there was anything I needed to let him know. I will definitely stay here again.

Very large area with shower house , coin operated laundry. Concrete pads with all hook ups. Very well shaded with large lake. Short distance to town. Would recommend it to anyone need a place to park camper or rv.
Great monthly rates lots of shade laundry and large shower and friendly management good fishing

showerReviews.reviewText: Hotel was location is great. Everything I needed was nearby. Hotel was clean, room was clean,  and staff was nice. Nevaeh and  Rean at the front desk were very helpful and attentive.  Would stay again next time I'm in town.

Great stay on the way to the beach. We came in late and had valet park our vehicle. Rooms were clean and comfortable. Shout out to Marcia who checked us in and Pat who brought our vehicle to us and got us on our way in the morning. Both ladies were very nice and helpful. I recommend this location.

Whoever is in charge of cleaning should be checked. Our rooms were not cleaned properly. Only after asking twice about it was it given attention. For example - the beds were not made the one day when we got back and then when they did come …

Excellent in every way with great service, signature cleanliness of the entry and the room.  Professional front desk personnel who were very knowledgeable of ways to make us comfortable and extend our stay.
